Author: nhatnhatkhongnhi
Title: Delete
Body: It was a pleasure to present Sports Ledger at the The Blockchain Summit Conference and Exhibition both as Gold & VIP Lounge Sponsor and Keynote Speakers, which took place on the 26th & 27th June 2018 at Olympia Conference Centre, London.  The Blockchain Summit London is a 2 day conference and exhibition connecting over 2,500 industry leaders, business decision makers, tech innovators and investors.  Based on unrivalled content and exceptional networking opportunities, Blockchain Summit is the largest dedicated Blockchain Event in Europe. No co-located side events. A purely Blockchain focused audience with the summit keynote programme full of unparalleled discussions with visionary speakers.  Showcasing cutting edge case studies with a ‚Äúhow-to‚Äù approach to deploying Blockchain technologies across industries like finance, insurance, logistics, utilities, media and entertainment, and more.

Author: Tatyana lushchik
Title: Delete
Body: The current data-sharing ecosystems within the world of sports are severely outdated and fragmented. Against this backdrop, Sports Ledger will be effective in overcoming legacy burdens and cumbersome procedures that are currently used to access sports data. This paradigmatic shift in the aggregation, processing and analysis of data will prevent decisions from being based on low-quality data, reduce information costs and resolve disparities in the data.

Author: daviszayn
Title: Delete
Body: Sports Ledger users will have access to advanced statistics, intuitive visualisations, performance indicators and presentational tools such as secondary notation, instead of traditional, text-based data icons and user interfaces such as typed command labels or text navigation.

Author: SportsLedger
Title: Delete
Body: Thank you for the kind words! Yes indeed it is promising to see more sports platforms sprouting up, we always encourage something we are so passionate about to grow along side us. It is however just a real shame they are lacking in any substance more than a basic ticketing platform on the Blockchain for matches.   Please take a look at our website and whitepaper and all will be clear why we can with our heads held high, openly state.. Sports Ledger is the first and only sporting platform truly aiming to revolutionize sports data, interaction and predictive analytics, within a wide scope of sports ant not just soccer / football.   Quote from: purewater on May 29, 2018, 07:29:51 AM With your platform and strong team, I think your project will do the best.  Thank you for the support, we shall soon be announcing more ambassadors who are Sporting Professionals and wish to publish their data and be among the first to use the Sports Ledger Platform and Ecosystem. Stay Tuned! We cant wait to announce them.    Quote from: MaksimMasterr on May 29, 2018, 06:24:52 AM Nice Project wishing you best! Quote from: teguhpurwadi on May 29, 2018, 12:13:03 AM I like this new innovation for sport business. This is truly a great idea to participate in sport. I have red the sport ledger description above, and it is very interesting with many benefits for all people. I'm sure will be many people to join this project. Hope this can be successful further and give a positive impact for sport.    Much appreciated. We love to great your feedback and comments and it means a lot to us to get such a positive response from visionaries like yourselves who understand and see there is a need to change the way sports and data merge.
